actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief to families with young children.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the exemption amount for dependent children who have not attained age seven to twice the current exemption amount. Sets forth recapture rules.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief to families with young children.
